snippet.title: The Heart of Darkness (Trailer)
snippet.description:
I thought this game looked so cool when I was a kid. (Well, I guess I was a teenager at the time)

Then I found out it was a Prince of Persia/Out of this World/Oddworld style Adventure game. And, well, I really hated those. You had to be so precise and the controls were so... sluggish ("realistic" as some would call it).

Still, this trailer is freakin' cool. Back then, this was cutting edge FMV for the PSone. It also came out on the PC, but I ripped this from a Playstation demo disc.
